# NSItemProvider.PreferredPresentationStyle.inline

**Case**

A presentation style indicating that the item provider data should be presented inline.

## Declaration

```swift
case inline
```

## Presentation Styles

- **NSItemProvider.PreferredPresentationStyle.unspecified**: A presentation style indicating that no preferred style is specified.
- **NSItemProvider.PreferredPresentationStyle.attachment**: A presentation style indicating that the item provider data should be presented as an attachment.

items.description: A presentation style indicating that no preferred style is specified.
items.name: NSItemProvider.PreferredPresentationStyle.unspecified

items.description: A presentation style indicating that the item provider data should be presented as an attachment.
items.name: NSItemProvider.PreferredPresentationStyle.attachment
